S.FORM: == Chenggong == u sulit nu Hulam: 成功鎮 u sulit nu Lipun: 成功鎮 u sulit nu Amilika: Chenggong Township u siwkay nu Chenggong Chenggong a sakuwan ku Taitung. kumud nu kalesakan, 143.53 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 65.53 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 1.94 km²), u kasabinawlan, 11,992 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 4,552 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 7,208 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 60%(Pangcah) ku kasabinawlan. u Pangcah ku sakalaniyazu'. Taitung sa , u kamu nu Sakizaya sa u Pusung. u Pangcah a kakitizaan tuud ku Pangcah a tademaw itini, yadah ku Pangcah a niyazu' itini, tabaki tu ku niyazu. u Sakizaya a tademaw izawtu ku Sakizaya itini, caayhen pasumad tu ngangan nu Sakizaya, mananamtu kuheni tu Pangcah. nikasakuwakuwan Chenggong mala 8 a cuwen atu 14 ku niyazu'. kina 14 a niyazu' sa, Ciliksay , Torik , Sa'aniwan , Kalahaay , Kahciday , Madawdaw , Dadowacen , Folalacay , Cirarokohay , Tomiyac , Piyoxo , Mararo'ong , Pisirian , Paongaongan . Madawdaw a kenis 成功鎮(阿美語:Madawdaw；客家話:Sṳ̀n-kûng-chṳ́n；臺灣話:Sîng-kong-tìn) . Madawdaw a kenis "A-mis a kamu, Madawdaw, ngaynga a kamu Sṳ̀n-kûng-chṳ́n, Taywan a kamu, Sîng-kong-tìn" nu Taywan Pusung a kuwan, tini i Pusung a kuwan nuwalian nuwamisan, nuwamisan mitules tu kakacawan a kenis, nuwalian micapi tu walibayu, nutimulan atu satipan silaed tu sadipasan a buyu' atu Fafokod a kenis malabelaw, satipan nuwamisa u Kalingku kunpo a kenis, masatanaya' ku liwliw, nu Pusung a kuwan satanaya'ay a sadipasan, hamin a kenis u hekal izaw ku 144 pin-bang-kung-li, u hamin nu kanatal a hekal u saka sepat tabakiay a kenus, nuwalian lekecuay adidi'ay a sadipasan a enal, satipan u sadipasan buyu'a buyu' a kakitizaan. tiniay u A-mis ku kamu. . zayhan walibayu bayu izaw ku tabakiaya a liked micaliway, sisa u mibutingay yadeh ku nilaculan, nu Kalingku sadipasan u satabakiay kasaupuan nialaan a buting, uyza mibutingay mabuwah kunipalahad, uyza sa u Madawdaw a kenis mala nu Posong a kuwan labuu saayaway tabakiay a kenis, zayhan hekal a kakitizaan u sakapahay, mala u saupuan nu caculilan nu Pusung a kuwan. kasumad nu lalay Madawdaw a kenis malumanay a ngangan " Ma-law-lu" zikuzan pangangan han tu " Singko" , zikuzan nu ngangnayaw malingatu pasumad tu ngangan "Madawdaw" han, nu nuwalian u satabakiay nu pibutingan a minatu. pakayniay Ma-law-low a ngangan u lalengatan caay kalecad ku kamu, nika katukuh kahulaman tu sazikuzay tu a mihcaan tini izaw tu ku A-mis a tademawan mananel atu pikalukan a kakitizaan, min-kou tulu a bataan izaw ku sepat a mihcaan tu saayaway zikuzan nu ngangayawan hawsa, uyza hamin nu kanatal " "Singko" a pangangan tu kenis pulung izaw ku tulu a kakitizaan, u cenbu a caay kalawlaw, pasakamu mipasuma pasuma tu ngnangan. uynian a kenis singanganay a tademaw u sakakaay mikawaway tu cebu hicasa u Singko a kawaw mahiza u An-pin a minatu, piazih tu Singko lalekalan palahad a lalekalan nuwamisan a likut tu Cin-kwng-aw, u Madawdaw, Cini-kwang Singko tuluay nu Tawwan micapi tu ngiha nu layak a kamu, zahked tu ku nipangangan tu Madawdaw a kenis katukuh ayza. hekal a lala'地理環境 namalilid nu penkuway, uyza u Madawdaw a kenis malalimuwa' ku liwliw, malikaku',. nutimulan saamisan tanaya' likecu', nuwalian micapi tu walibayu, satipan talakaw ku macebed ku buyu' mitulin mutuseng tu sadipasan a byu', u lala' psawali matukinih, hamin nu buyu' a lala atu a puyu'ay a buyu'. sadipasa a enal adidi' likecu, uyza dada' Madawdaw ku saahebalal, nu Kalingku a sadipasn tulu ku tabakiay bayu lekad. Madawdaw capiay masakululay a buyu' nu Singkuay masakululay a buyu', angangan a buyu' izaw ku Pisirian a buyu', Singko a buyu', Cilinkesay a buyu' satalakaway a buyu' u Singko a buyu' " katalakaw 1682m" u satalakaway nu sadipasay a buyu'. nuwalian sadipasan a kakitian i liwliwan izaw ku sadipasan atu buyu'an tusa ku kakitizaan. . sadipasan makakilac, izaw ku malingangu'ay a bayu, madicemay a ba'tu, likenlikenan a bayu,, tepad a bayu , izaw henay ku sadipasan masatukalay a lala', tiu'y buhang, masapucu'ay a sansanguan atu masapucu'ay a ba'tu micidekay a azihan a liwliw, labu nu kenis u singanganay nu layanay a azihan a kakitizaan u Nawalian atu Aw'awan. buyu'an , izaw ku lalaan, sadipasan masakululay a buyu'an talakaw ateka' satungduday ba'tu a buyu', nuwalian yadah ku lamalay buyu' a ba'tu a lala'tabakiay kibetulay malaslasay a ba'tu makutaay a satunduh, masa apuyu'ay dihkuay a buyu'an. Mdawdaw tungusy u caledesay kabalian a demaad, u demiad caledes tunu udad sa, yadah ku liked nu sauwac nika malikid ku nanum a puyu' a culil, caay ka hapinang ku kayadeh nu nanum, satipan a sadipasan a buyu' pasayza i nuwalian micumuntu tu walibabu'. paymihcaan kayadah nu udad 2,100 kung-li, palalecad tu akuti' 23,8 pasintu. kahenuln a nipalumaan izaw ku mami atu niacakan a buting. tademaw Madawdaw a kenis u tademaw pakala tu 1,36 mang ku tademaw, i Pusungay a tademaw sakatulu a katuuday nu pikawawan a kakitizaan, uyni dada' i Pusung a tuse, Puyuma a kenis zuma a ka katuud nu tademaw pakala tu 95 dada' ku tademaw /km² , i hamin nu kanatal hamin a kenisan, u katuud nu tademaw pasazikuzan miasip u saka tulu, uyni dada' ku talakaway tu Kalingku akuwan Cingaloan a kenis, Poseko a kenis. kakitizian a niyazu' Cin-kuw-aw i ayaw nu 1920 a mihcaan nu tiniay a kakitizaan u kasaupuan mikawaw tu kawaw nu hitay, 1920 a mihcaan hawsa kasaupuan nu sakikalisiw maniyul mabulaw tayza i Singko, Cin-kuw-aw adidi' aca panganga han tu Folalacay. Cinkuwangaw Cinkuwngaw izaw ku lahaday sangangu' a minatu, nu hekal a kasahini, i ayaw a mihcaan u Kalingku, puyuma " ayzaay a posong" likut nu tusaay a minatu, u sakahenulan sacumud nu minatu, tini i A-mis kananelan a niyazu' laed nu kananelan nu Pin-pu-cu a niyazu', izaw ku iciba lihalay, Layak a tademaw mikawaway tu patumaliway atu tiniay mananel, mala u tiniay cacayay nu kananelan nu Layakay a niyazu'. Singku Singku a kenis palahad i 1920 a mihcaan u sakahenulan a mihcaan, saayaw izaw ku tabakiay a balunga' pasasa, pasayzaan i Posong a zazan malepun tu, 1921 a mihcaan u pisakawan nu cenbu malimad tayza i Singku, 1922 a mihcaan malingatu kakilul a misang' tu cilis pasilsilan nu nanum, sapananu pisilsilan nu nanum a kawaw, lekakawa tu zazan, Singku pisakawan nu cenbu a kakitizaan tuse lekakawa a kawaw, u Singku mala u sadipasan kasaupuan nu pikawawan nu cenbu, misiwbanay tu tuud. Madawdaw nu mibutingay a minatu malepun tu ku pisanga' u Singku a kenis kalamkam kunikalahad, pitinamay a lamangan atu nilaculan papulung tu kayadah mahapinang kunikacunus. zikuzan nu ngangayaw Singku a kenis u palahad i 1922 a mihcaan Singku a kenis palalecad tu lekakawa. kakenis pikuwanan tu kanatal 1946 a mihcaan pikuwanan nu cenbu a kakitizaan ngangnan u Posong a kuwan Singko a kakitizaan Singko a kenis, itawya u Posong a kuwan i labu uyza dada' Pusung cacayay a kenis sakawawan nu cebu akakitizaan, Lilong atu Singko nu kenisay a sakawawan nu cebu a kakitizaan, tatenga' atu palahad a kawaw caay ka lecad, uyni a kakitizaan cebu a sakuwan pasumad han tu kenis, zayhan u Singko atu Cang-huw, Cya-i labu nu tusaay a kuwan malecad tu Singko a ngangan, maleku ku nipasumad Singko a ngangan, mala u Singko kenis tu. minatu Madawdaw pibutingnan a minatu, singangan aca tu Singko pibutingay a minatu, Kakawasan a minatu nu Taywan a sadipasan macapiay nu mibutingay kahenulan kakitizaan, u saka tusa lekad pibutingan a minatu, nu bayuay nialaan a lami' maacakay a buting a singangan. adidi'ay minatu nu mibutingay Ci-huy mibutingay a minatu.

== Chenggong == o solit no Holam: 成功鎮 o solit no Lipon: 成功鎮 o solit no Amilika: Chenggong Township o siwkay no Chenggong Chenggong a sakowan ko Taitong. komod no kalesakan, 143.53 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 65.53 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 1.94 km²), o kasabinawlan, 11,992 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 4,552 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 7,208 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 60%(Pangcah) ko kasabinawlan. o Pangcah ko sakalaniyazo'. Taitong sa , o kamo no Sakizaya sa o Posong. o Pangcah a kakitizaan tood ko Pangcah a tademaw itini, yadah ko Pangcah a niyazo' itini, tabaki to ko niyazo. o Sakizaya a tademaw izawto ko Sakizaya itini, caayhen pasomad to ngangan no Sakizaya, mananamto koheni to Pangcah. nikasakowakowan Chenggong mala 8 a cowen ato 14 ko niyazo'. kina 14 a niyazo' sa, Ciliksay , Torik , Sa'aniwan , Kalahaay , Kahciday , Madawdaw , Dadowacen , Folalacay , Cirarokohay , Tomiyac , Piyoxo , Mararo'ong , Pisirian , Paongaongan . Madawdaw a kenis 成功鎮(阿美語:Madawdaw；客家話:Sṳ̀n-kûng-chṳ́n；臺灣話:Sîng-kong-tìn) . Madawdaw a kenis "A-mis a kamo, Madawdaw, ngaynga a kamo Sṳ̀n-kûng-chṳ́n, Taywan a kamo, Sîng-kong-tìn" no Taywan Posong a kowan, tini i Posong a kowan nowalian nowamisan, nowamisan mitoles to kakacawan a kenis, nowalian micapi to walibayo, notimolan ato satipan silaed to sadipasan a boyo' ato Fafokod a kenis malabelaw, satipan nowamisa o Kalingko konpo a kenis, masatanaya' ko liwliw, no Posong a kowan satanaya'ay a sadipasan, hamin a kenis o hekal izaw ko 144 pin-bang-kong-li, o hamin no kanatal a hekal o saka sepat tabakiay a kenos, nowalian lekecoay adidi'ay a sadipasan a enal, satipan o sadipasan boyo'a boyo' a kakitizaan. tiniay o A-mis ko kamo. . zayhan walibayo bayo izaw ko tabakiaya a liked micaliway, sisa o mibotingay yadeh ko nilacolan, no Kalingko sadipasan o satabakiay kasaopoan nialaan a boting, oyza mibotingay mabowah konipalahad, oyza sa o Madawdaw a kenis mala no Posong a kowan laboo saayaway tabakiay a kenis, zayhan hekal a kakitizaan o sakapahay, mala o saopoan no cacolilan no Posong a kowan. kasomad no lalay Madawdaw a kenis malomanay a ngangan " Ma-law-lo" zikozan pangangan han to " Singko" , zikozan no ngangnayaw malingato pasomad to ngangan "Madawdaw" han, no nowalian o satabakiay no pibotingan a minato. pakayniay Ma-law-low a ngangan o lalengatan caay kalecad ko kamo, nika katokoh kaholaman to sazikozay to a mihcaan tini izaw to ko A-mis a tademawan mananel ato pikalokan a kakitizaan, min-koo tolo a bataan izaw ko sepat a mihcaan to saayaway zikozan no ngangayawan hawsa, oyza hamin no kanatal " "Singko" a pangangan to kenis polong izaw ko tolo a kakitizaan, o cenbo a caay kalawlaw, pasakamo mipasoma pasoma to ngnangan. oynian a kenis singanganay a tademaw o sakakaay mikawaway to cebo hicasa o Singko a kawaw mahiza o An-pin a minato, piazih to Singko lalekalan palahad a lalekalan nowamisan a likot to Cin-kwng-aw, o Madawdaw, Cini-kwang Singko toloay no Tawwan micapi to ngiha no layak a kamo, zahked to ko nipangangan to Madawdaw a kenis katokoh ayza. hekal a lala'地理環境 namalilid no penkoway, oyza o Madawdaw a kenis malalimowa' ko liwliw, malikako',. notimolan saamisan tanaya' likeco', nowalian micapi to walibayo, satipan talakaw ko macebed ko boyo' mitolin motoseng to sadipasan a byo', o lala' psawali matokinih, hamin no boyo' a lala ato a poyo'ay a boyo'. sadipasa a enal adidi' likeco, oyza dada' Madawdaw ko saahebalal, no Kalingko a sadipasn tolo ko tabakiay bayo lekad. Madawdaw capiay masakololay a boyo' no Singkoay masakololay a boyo', angangan a boyo' izaw ko Pisirian a boyo', Singko a boyo', Cilinkesay a boyo' satalakaway a boyo' o Singko a boyo' " katalakaw 1682m" o satalakaway no sadipasay a boyo'. nowalian sadipasan a kakitian i liwliwan izaw ko sadipasan ato boyo'an tosa ko kakitizaan. . sadipasan makakilac, izaw ko malingango'ay a bayo, madicemay a ba'to, likenlikenan a bayo,, tepad a bayo , izaw henay ko sadipasan masatokalay a lala', tio'y bohang, masapoco'ay a sansangoan ato masapoco'ay a ba'to micidekay a azihan a liwliw, labo no kenis o singanganay no layanay a azihan a kakitizaan o Nawalian ato Aw'awan. boyo'an , izaw ko lalaan, sadipasan masakololay a boyo'an talakaw ateka' satongdoday ba'to a boyo', nowalian yadah ko lamalay boyo' a ba'to a lala'tabakiay kibetolay malaslasay a ba'to makotaay a satondoh, masa apoyo'ay dihkoay a boyo'an. Mdawdaw tongosy o caledesay kabalian a demaad, o demiad caledes tono odad sa, yadah ko liked no saowac nika malikid ko nanom a poyo' a colil, caay ka hapinang ko kayadeh no nanom, satipan a sadipasan a boyo' pasayza i nowalian micomonto to walibabo'. paymihcaan kayadah no odad 2,100 kong-li, palalecad to akoti' 23,8 pasinto. kahenoln a nipalomaan izaw ko mami ato niacakan a boting. tademaw Madawdaw a kenis o tademaw pakala to 1,36 mang ko tademaw, i Posongay a tademaw sakatolo a katooday no pikawawan a kakitizaan, oyni dada' i Posong a tose, Poyoma a kenis zoma a ka katood no tademaw pakala to 95 dada' ko tademaw /km² , i hamin no kanatal hamin a kenisan, o katood no tademaw pasazikozan miasip o saka tolo, oyni dada' ko talakaway to Kalingko akowan Cingaloan a kenis, Poseko a kenis. kakitizian a niyazo' Cin-kow-aw i ayaw no 1920 a mihcaan no tiniay a kakitizaan o kasaopoan mikawaw to kawaw no hitay, 1920 a mihcaan hawsa kasaopoan no sakikalisiw maniyol mabolaw tayza i Singko, Cin-kow-aw adidi' aca panganga han to Folalacay. Cinkowangaw Cinkowngaw izaw ko lahaday sangango' a minato, no hekal a kasahini, i ayaw a mihcaan o Kalingko, poyoma " ayzaay a posong" likot no tosaay a minato, o sakahenolan sacomod no minato, tini i A-mis kananelan a niyazo' laed no kananelan no Pin-po-co a niyazo', izaw ko iciba lihalay, Layak a tademaw mikawaway to patomaliway ato tiniay mananel, mala o tiniay cacayay no kananelan no Layakay a niyazo'. Singko Singko a kenis palahad i 1920 a mihcaan o sakahenolan a mihcaan, saayaw izaw ko tabakiay a balonga' pasasa, pasayzaan i Posong a zazan malepon to, 1921 a mihcaan o pisakawan no cenbo malimad tayza i Singko, 1922 a mihcaan malingato kakilol a misang' to cilis pasilsilan no nanom, sapanano pisilsilan no nanom a kawaw, lekakawa to zazan, Singko pisakawan no cenbo a kakitizaan tose lekakawa a kawaw, o Singko mala o sadipasan kasaopoan no pikawawan no cenbo, misiwbanay to tood. Madawdaw no mibotingay a minato malepon to ko pisanga' o Singko a kenis kalamkam konikalahad, pitinamay a lamangan ato nilacolan papolong to kayadah mahapinang konikaconos. zikozan no ngangayaw Singko a kenis o palahad i 1922 a mihcaan Singko a kenis palalecad to lekakawa. kakenis pikowanan to kanatal 1946 a mihcaan pikowanan no cenbo a kakitizaan ngangnan o Posong a kowan Singko a kakitizaan Singko a kenis, itawya o Posong a kowan i labo oyza dada' Posong cacayay a kenis sakawawan no cebo akakitizaan, Lilong ato Singko no kenisay a sakawawan no cebo a kakitizaan, tatenga' ato palahad a kawaw caay ka lecad, oyni a kakitizaan cebo a sakowan pasomad han to kenis, zayhan o Singko ato Cang-how, Cya-i labo no tosaay a kowan malecad to Singko a ngangan, maleko ko nipasomad Singko a ngangan, mala o Singko kenis to. minato Madawdaw pibotingnan a minato, singangan aca to Singko pibotingay a minato, Kakawasan a minato no Taywan a sadipasan macapiay no mibotingay kahenolan kakitizaan, o saka tosa lekad pibotingan a minato, no bayoay nialaan a lami' maacakay a boting a singangan. adidi'ay minato no mibotingay Ci-hoy mibotingay a minato.
